page.title: 08SETTLEMENTS/999/BUILD MAT
page.content: {SETTLEMENTS} Danehill,Chelwood Common and Nutley are linear. {EMERGENCY SERVICES Most inhabitants use Forest Row or Isle of Thorns surgeries. Some use Newick Health Surgery. Fire engines come from Maresfield and East Grinstead.The local hospital is East Grinstead which is also where the police come from. In an emergency Kent, Sussex or Pembury Hospital can be used BUILDING MATERIALS A small proportion of the houses are built of local stone. Victorian and Georgian houses are quite common. The older houses (about 1440) have an oak and timber frame.
